verses.name: Luke 8:16
verses.text: No man, when he hath lighted a candle, covereth it with a vessel, or putteth it under a bed; but setteth it on a candlestick, that they which enter in may see the light.

verses.name: Luke 8:17
verses.text: For nothing is secret, that shall not be made manifest; neither any thing hid, that shall not be known and come abroad.

verses.name: Luke 8:18
verses.text: Take heed therefore how ye hear: for whosoever hath, to him shall be given; and whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have.
